title: Why am I punished for a buggy client?
body:
I don't expect any kind of reparations, but I want someone at Riot to understand my frustration. For the second time in the past couple of months, my client crashed right after the game loaded. Every attempt to rejoin was met with another crash, so I restarted League entirely. Naturally, some files had been corrupted _by the game itself_. So I got to sit around and wait for League to try to repair itself. By the time I finally got back in, the game had been remade and I was given the Leaver title in my match history.

My reward for trying to play tonight was an LP loss and a shameful match history. I understand that writing code to recognize situations like mine is insane on the face of it, but I also can't imagine what could possibly cause a game to corrupt itself under completely normal circumstances. I can't express how discouraging it is when shit like this happens. I just want to play, but I'm being punished for trying.

replies.body:
We understand that sometimes *shit just breaks*. This is why you'll never receive a penalty for crashing out of or disconnecting from a single game. However, if a trend of disconnections or leaves occurs on your account, you can eventually earn a low-priority queue. Corruptions that force you to repair typically point towards either a poor installation (if not in the default directory) or missing system permissions that League heavily relies on.

I strongly recommend working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure you've configured League to run with the right access rights. Let me know if you continue to have issues with this.

Thanks for responding. Makes me feel a little better that someone actually read this. :/

Is there a version of that guide for OSX?

There isn't, but the steps below should help.

* Make sure macOS is completely [up to date](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq8).

* Configure League to operate with [admin privileges](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9)

* [Run a Repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#mq3) of League

Let me know if you have any other questions or issues with this.
